front.title: TUBA as IPng: A White Paper

abstract.t: TUBA (TCP and UDP with Bigger Addresses) is a solution for IPng. TUBA has two components: a replacement for the IPv4 network layer protocol and a transition strategy. The TUBA transition strategy is fully documented in another 'Transition Plan for TUBA/CLNP,' draft-tuba-transition-00.txt, by D. Piscitello. The TUBA concept for IPng was originally presented in RFC 1347 in June, 1992.
